body:
Well, as some of you know, my mouse is broken and I use a trackpad now.
#TrackpadBasedGod
I was playing Nebula today and I was shooting people.
Do you think these are the farthest shots using a trackpad?
http://imgur.com/a/DofKS
What do you think?
~DiamondPorkchop3

replies.body: Trackpads aren't hard to shoot with though... They are hard to fight with/turn but make shots easier, oh and I've got a 176 block shot on Neb with a trackpad.

replies.body: I hate trackpads for gaming. Especially mine. You can't change your view whilst running. So I went out and bought a 10 dollar mouse XD
